H0.text: Who owned the brass factory and just about everything else in the sitcom Brass. Reginald Pembly

H1.text: Who owned the brass factory and just about everything else in the sitcom Brass. Cedric Bottomley

H2.text: Who owned the brass factory and just about everything else in the sitcom Brass. Malcolm Fothergill

H3.text: Who owned the brass factory and just about everything else in the sitcom Brass. Bradley Hardacre

A4.text: The Hardacre family was headed by Bradley Hardacre, a self-made businessman who owned the Hardacre empire, including the mine, mill, and munitions factory.
